headline: Digital Utility Market Size to Surpass USD 535.3 Billion by 2032, Owing to the Rapid Adoption of Smart Grid Technologies and AI-Based Utility Solutions | SNS Insider

headline: Why IBM Is the Best Quantum Computing Stock to Buy Right Now
summary: IBM is a quantum computing pioneer.  The company expects to reach true quantum advantage by 2026 and have a large fault-tolerant system in place by 2029.  With a long track record and a clear roadmap, IBM is emerging as a quantum computing leader.
